## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
Hey, I have some more questions about VerusIDs. Can I buy and sell VerusIDs off-chain, without using the blockchain?

**AI Assistant:**
No, VerusIDs can only be bought and sold on-chain, using the blockchain. This allows for a completely decentralized and transparent way of executing transactions, with the ability to advertise offers directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of an NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all to see. This transparency is a core aspect of the Verus ecosystem. Do you have any other questions about buying and selling VerusIDs?

**User:**
Another question: Is it possible to execute transactions using VerusIDs without paying or offering to pay from a transparent address?

**AI Assistant:**
No, with VerusIDs, you can pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, which is still auditable by you. This allows for flexible and secure transaction execution. The private address option ensures that your transaction history remains private, while still maintaining the transparency and security of the blockchain. Does that answer your question?

**User:**
I've also been looking into Verus Vault, and I'm not sure if I understand how it works. Can I use Verus Vault to protect funds on a VerusID without having a primary identity and at least one revocation/recovery ID configured?

**AI Assistant:**
No, enabling revocation, recovery, and all Verus Vault capabilities requires you to have one primary identity and at least one revocation/recovery ID configured. Without this setup, you cannot use Verus Vault to protect your funds. This is a crucial security measure to ensure that your funds are safe and can be recovered in case something goes wrong. If you're unsure about how to set up your VerusID or Verus Vault, I'd be happy to help you with that!
Can I buy and sell VerusIDs off-chain, without using the blockchain?

No, VerusIDs can only be bought and sold on-chain, using the blockchain. This allows for a completely decentralized and transparent way of executing transactions, with the ability to advertise offers directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of an NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all to see.

### Verus ID and NFT Marketplace
Buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all the world to see. Execute transactions in a completely decentralized way. Pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, still auditable by you. Accept payment to either as well, and best of all, execute your transactions directly, peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. Don’t worry the on-chain model still makes room for owners to select and share proceeds with value added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world.### Verus Vault
With Verus Vault you can now protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key! If you lock your VerusID with Vault you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. While locked, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so. Of course, you can also still receive funds.IT IS IMPORTANT TO NOTE THAT ENABLING REVOCATION, RECOVERY, AND ALL VERUS VAULT CAPABILITIES REQUIRE YOU TO HAVE ONE PRIMARY IDENTITY, AND AT LEAST ONE REVOCATION/RECOVERY ID CONFIGURED.
